data.title: Russian Movies Online
data.meta_description: Your home to enjoy the magic of contemporary and classic cinema from Eastern Europe, the Caucasus and Central Asia.
data.text:
Explore our carefully curated collection of unmissable Russian and Soviet film.

Our collection of early silent film masterpieces includes Yakov Protazanov’s science fiction extravaganza Aelita, Queen of Mars, Sergei Eisenstein’s Battleship Potemkin, Boris Barnet’s comic caper The Girl with a Hatbox and much more. We hold gems of Thaw cinema by influential directors such as Gleb Panfilov, Aleksei German, and Marlen Khutsiev. We also have a rare collection of Sakha cinema, from Eduard Novikov’s multiple-award winning The Lord Eagle to pioneering titles like Summer House.

In Pick of the Week, our contemporary collection, where we program award-winning recent films over a three-week period, we stream important modern voices: from Renata Litvinova, to Valeria Gai-Germanika, Andrei Smirnov to Andrei Zvyagintsev. All of this and more, including specially commissioned program notes, director interviews, essays, watchlists, and more.

Join us at Klassiki and take advantage of your FREE 7 day membership trial today!
